terms.YES: If the Memphis Grizzlies confirm the trade of Bane for Magic’s Anthony, Caldwell-Pope and draft picks by July 31, 2025.
terms.NO: If the Grizzlies do not confirm the trade, or if any of the involved players are not part of the trade, by July 31.

patched_title: Will the Grizzlies complete a trade involving Bane for Magic’s Anthony, Caldwell-Pope and draft picks by July 31?
refined_title: Will the Grizzlies complete a trade involving Bane for Magic’s Anthony, Caldwell-Pope and draft picks by July 31 exceeding $1 million in funding?
balanced_title: Will the Grizzlies complete a trade involving Bane for Magic’s Anthony, Caldwell-Pope and draft picks by July 31 exceeding $1 million in funding?

title: Will Shelby County approve a $1B overhaul of the Aging 201 Poplar jail by December 31?
purpose: This contract forecasts whether Shelby County will decide to invest in a $1B overhaul of the Aging 201 Poplar jail, a major civic project that will have significant impacts on local infrastructure, economy, and public safety...
scope: This contract only applies to the formal approval of the $1B overhaul in its current proposed form, not subsequent amendments, changes in budget, or implementation delays...

terms.YES: If Shelby County formally approves the $1B overhaul of the Aging 201 Poplar jail by December 31, 2025.
terms.NO: If Shelby County does not approve, or rejects the proposal, by December 31, 2025.

patched_title: Will Shelby County officially approve a $1B renovation plan for the Aging 201 Poplar jail by December 31?
refined_title: Will Shelby County officially approve a $1B renovation plan for the Aging 201 Poplar jail by December 31 by October 1?
balanced_title: Will Shelby County officially approve a $1B renovation plan for the Aging 201 Poplar jail by December 31 by October 1?

title: Will the AFIRM graduation and county commissioners' honor event for Memphis fathers occur by July 15?
purpose: This contract forecasts whether the AFIRM graduation and the county commissioners' event to honor Memphis fathers will take place as planned...
scope: This contract includes the occurrence of both the AFIRM graduation and the county commissioners' honor event for Memphis fathers. Any changes in the event format, such as moving from in-person to virtual, do not affect the contract as long as the events occur...

terms.YES: If both the AFIRM graduation and the county commissioners' honor event for Memphis fathers occur by July 15, 2025.
terms.NO: If either event does not occur by July 15, 2025.

title: Will the Memphis City Council approve a raise for city employees and funding for MATA by July 31?
purpose: This contract forecasts whether the City Council will formally approve a raise for city employees and additional funding for the Memphis Area Transit Authority (MATA)...
scope: This contract only applies to the formal vote of approval for the raise and funding in their current form, not subsequent amendments or implementation delays...

terms.YES: If the City Council votes to approve both the raise for city employees and additional funding for MATA by July 31, 2025.
terms.NO: If the Council does not vote, or rejects either or both proposals, by July 31.

refined_title: By July 31, will the Memphis City Council have approved both a raise for city employees and funding for MATA by October 1?
balanced_title: By July 31, will the Memphis City Council have approved both a raise for city employees and funding for MATA by October 1?

title: Will the proposed federal budget cuts to SNAP and Medicaid in Tennessee be implemented by December 31, 2025?
purpose: This contract forecasts whether the proposed federal budget cuts to the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) and Medicaid in Tennessee, as expressed concern by the Tennessee NAACP, will be implemented...
scope: This contract only applies to the implementation of the proposed federal budget cuts to SNAP and Medicaid in Tennessee, not to other states or programs...

terms.YES: If the proposed federal budget cuts to SNAP and Medicaid in Tennessee are implemented by December 31, 2025.
terms.NO: If the proposed budget cuts are not implemented in Tennessee by December 31, 2025.

title: Will Memphis hold a 'One Hour, United Voices' Juneteenth celebration by June 19?
purpose: This contract predicts whether the city of Memphis will host a 'One Hour, United Voices' event to commemorate Juneteenth...
scope: This contract only applies to the formal organization and execution of the event, not the attendance numbers or subjective measures of success...

terms.YES: If the 'One Hour, United Voices' Juneteenth celebration is officially held in Memphis by June 19, 2025.
terms.NO: If the event does not occur, or is significantly altered from the 'One Hour, United Voices' format, by June 19.
